website_summaries.verdict: Everyone will love this stylish, Pinterest-worthy garland.
pros: Clear instructions make for simple assembly
Kit includes balloon pump and tape
When fully assembled, garland is about 7' long
Aesthetically pleasing design will receive plenty of compliments
Kit sits at a reasonable price point

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to set up looked great!
customer_reviews.text: Really loved this baby shower party pack, it was just the right size and it fit my backdrop perfectly! The balloon quality was great and the colors turn out just the way I wanted. What I really liked about this baby shower decoration kit is that it came with everything I needed. The pump, the balloons and the balloon tape. Didn’t have to get helium so that was also nice. At the end I just hung it with tape and it still looked great. Overall I would recommend. Especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: ko

customer_reviews.title: So Pretty!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth the money. My friends and I assembled the garland from large balloons to small balloons, and the baby letter towards the smaller balloons. It was a bit of a challenge fitting in all the balloons, but it looked pinterest beautiful for our friends baby shower. Make sure to blow less air in certain balloons to customize your garland. Thank you for the set!
customer_reviews.author: npark

customer_reviews.title: Looks alright, but have a backup plan
customer_reviews.text: The instructions could be a little clearer (maybe link to a video instead). With some brain power we figured out a good plan to make it work though. There are a fair amount of the 2 sizes of balloon. However our “baby” of baby girl had a defective seal, and wouldn’t hold air. We encountered this about 2 hours before the shower, so that was kind of a bummer. Fortunately “girl” sort of got the point across.
customer_reviews.author: A. Davie

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous but "baby" wouldn't inflate
customer_reviews.text: The kit turned out stunning and I would give it 5 stars but we couldn't inflate the "baby" part of the kit. We just ended up using the "girl" part, so that sucked that we got a defective part in the kit. They do give you a handheld balloon pump and instructions so that was nice. Does take a good amount of time to assemble... My girls weren't too happy, but I was happy with the result! Also very heavy to hang, make sure to keep that in mind. Kept falling so we just used a lot of heavy-duty shipping tape.
customer_reviews.author: Reham

customer_reviews.title: This is a JOKE!
customer_reviews.text: This product was a joke I’m sorry to say. The girl balloon had a hole so the day of the baby shower I had to improvise. Then the balloons were so SMALL! They were literally the size of a mini soccer ball and they kept popping when we were blowing them up. Overall I’m so disappointed because I did not have a backup plan so I had to go to dollar tree to buy balloons and a banner. Oh and the leaves do not come with it. Just saying. I wish I could get my money back for this order but I was so disappointed I threw everything away except for the baby balloon.
customer_reviews.author: Wimberly

customer_reviews.title: rose gold color is nice
customer_reviews.text: Baby balloon was easy to inflate and looked great. Girl balloon did not inflate due to a seam on the 'L' not being completely sealed. You could see where it was pressed together and the press ran off. We tried glue and tape and it held for about 15 min. Disappointing for the baby shower.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute Product, Worth the Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a baby shower and it turned out beautifully! I purchased the fake foliage separately to make it look like the advertised picture. It was easy to assemble, although I asked for someone’s help to keep the garland straight while putting the balloons on. It took about 40-60 minutes to assemble so I recommend doing it ahead of time if you anticipate being short on time.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Reid

customer_reviews.title: Loved it! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy to put together and looked great! Having the pump included was what made me choose this over other options!! My sister loved it and we pulled balloons off for the kids at the end of the shower for them to take home! One pro tip....I assembled this on the floor of the venue where we had the shower and unfortunately some of the balloons had dirt and hair stick to them which was hard to brush it off because of static. I'd recommend assembling on top of a clean surface!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Theriault

customer_reviews.title: One word Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my sip and see to welcome my daughter. It came the day of my event and I still was able to finish it before everyone arrived. You should put aside 45 minutes to an hour to blow up all the balloons . It comes with a pump and something to attach all the balloons to. The balloon colors are so pretty. Only additional things I would recommend that u may need is a thin piece of string To attach the words to the balloons and some thumbtacks to attach it to a wall. I highly recommend this product I will buy again just to keep in the stash
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Mckeithan

customer_reviews.title: Buy it! Beautiful for baby shower!
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! It comes with a very easy to use pump and the instructions are easy to follow. This looked beautiful at my shower! It took me maybe 45 minutes to blow up all balloons and it took my sister about 45 minutes to put the garland together. Nice packaging, too!
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: A must have for a baby shower!
customer_reviews.text: So impressed with this!! I didn’t expect it to be so big and such high quality! It came so nicely in a box with a pump and clear instructions. Looked amazing at my sisters baby shower!
customer_reviews.author: Haileyn

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: This balloon garland is beautiful and easy to put together. It also lasts several days if you wanted to put it together ahead of time. It comes with plenty of balloons, so even if you accidentally pop one (like I did), your garland will still look lovely. Took about 1.5 hours for one person to blow up all balloons and create garland. Included pump is very easy to use and instructions are simple to follow. Highly recommend, especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Hart

customer_reviews.title: Adorable Shower Decor for Baby Girl
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly adorable for our shower! It took more time than anticipated as there were a LOT of balloons to tie. So don't decorate the morning of like I did! We still have it up because it's so festive and delightful to look at. Great instructions. Easy to put up using thumb tacks. Would definitely purchase again. Wish it came with the palm fronds shown in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Libertini

customer_reviews.title: Amazing balloon garland
customer_reviews.text: Amazing balloon garland!! A vendor in my area wanted 1000+ for the same garland. Took me about 2 hours to assemble by myself. Very easy to build-just takes time. I would recommend for any party!
customer_reviews.author: BigMama224

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and Fun
customer_reviews.text: This was absolutely adorable and fun to put together. I like the pump that was included. We were able to blow up many balloons quickly. Great quality. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Iguana

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This product was everything it said it was. I am not super crafty and I had no problem what so ever assembling this. It took me about an hour from start to finish. I blew the balloons up the night before, put them into trash bags to transport and assembled it at the venue. Easy, easy, easy. The colors were perfect! It was bigger than I expected and was a beautiful decoration for my daughters baby shower. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ann K.

customer_reviews.title: Great price for this product
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a baby shower. The quality was great and the price was not bad compared to some other places. Had a lot of compliments
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Coulter

customer_reviews.title: User friendly!
customer_reviews.text: You have everything you need in this kit! The hand pump was so easy to use. Instructions were easy to follow. This was my first ever balloon garland and I’m hooked. Hopefully you can come up with more balloon garland kits like these! My BFF was so happy with the baby shower decor and the guests were stunned with all the details of the garland. PS: ive added palm leaves in between balloons
customer_reviews.author: Ayee Cee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Tropical babyshower
customer_reviews.text: Used this for a friends babyshower. It was definitely the focal piece of the room. Assembly was a little time consuming and I recommend assembling onsight. Easy for one person to assemble or multiple folks. The colors are vibrant and really stand out.
customer_reviews.author: whamilton7

customer_reviews.title: Very happy.
customer_reviews.text: I am so very happy with the purchase of this decoration of balloon garland and am impressed how it turned out. It took a while to tie the balloons, that part was the hardest to do. Once they were done it went well and am happy with result. It I would definitly buy a decoration similar again. The price was worth it too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for baby girl
customer_reviews.text: Looked great and very reasonable compared to party store locally.
customer_reviews.author: TRACY

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: The product was easy to assemble with the directions provided. The pump made the process so easy and quick. I anticipated spending a couple hours putting it together and was able to have it completed in about 30 minutes. I will definitely use again!
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Display
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product, it looked beautiful. Very easy to assemble. Only issue I had was that the baby girl foil balloon entry holes for the string, easily ripped. Had to tape them and poke a new hole. Material needs to be a bit stronger. Also, there were a few balloons that had holes and couldn’t blow them up, but it was okay since there were enough. I would still purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Jess1503

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but missing confetti balloons.
customer_reviews.text: Loved that this set came with all the balloons, balloon attachment strip, hand pump, and balloon letters for a great price. Unfortunately I didn’t receive it with the clear gold confetti balloons as advertised and it just came with more pink and white balloons. It also didn’t have any rose gold balloons or the pearlescent look that some of the other reviews had but other than that it was still a gorgeous setup. Didn’t even use all my balloons.
customer_reviews.author: Carol kim

customer_reviews.title: Looked great, did not come with the greenery as picture.
customer_reviews.text: The ballons took about an hour to pump up with air. The assembly was easy, just pull the ballon knot through the plastic ribbon. It looked so good at the babyshower!
customer_reviews.author: t.roo

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful kit.
customer_reviews.text: I love this kit. Everything came in good condition. Can’t wait to use it for my baby shower next week. I recommend this product. Buy it buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Spanish girl.

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!! 💕😄🎈
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely PERFECT and everyone loved the decorations 💕😊👏🏾💕! The balloon garland set was very easy to follow. It took me about 2 hours to assemble by myself. The second time I assembled a balloon garland it went by super fast since I had the hang of it. I would give more stars if I could! Totally satisfied with this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Ebony Israel

customer_reviews.title: Easy and professional looking!
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up. I purchased an electric pump from target to help me speed up process. Took about 60-90min by myself. It was used on Sunday and it's still going strong (slightly deflated) and it's Friday! Lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: Great packaging/beautiful details
customer_reviews.text: I received this is a timely manner. 2days with prime! It came prepackaged in a small rectangle box and had such cute details. The directions are extremely easy to read. Even tells you how many pumps to make each balloon the same size!! Would love some how to the attach it to the wall or other configurations.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Cute baby shower addition!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my sister's baby shower. It's really neat how it all comes together. It does take some time to put together but you can blow up the balloons a day early. I wish the gold letters that say "baby girl" were attached somehow. I had difficulty attaching them when decorating. Overall it was a nice addition and it got a lot of compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: So stinkin cute. Had so many compliments and it was so easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lane

customer_reviews.title: Turned out beautifully!
customer_reviews.text: This looked wonderful!!! Took a little bit of time to blow up all the balloons but it was easy to put together and looked great! Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: So beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I love it, it was perfect for the baby shower! And reusable for the plastic band for future balloon banners! ♥️
customer_reviews.author: Mlee

customer_reviews.title: LOVED it
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I have to complain about is it’s a decent amount of money for something you’re going to throw away, so you have to be okay with that. Overall, it was so easy to put together and I LOVED how it looked! It was so perfect for my sisters baby shower.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 100% satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This decoration garland is really beautiful for baby girl shower.i really loved this product because its so easy to assemble.i was expecting only small balloons but i got so many and different varieties.i highly recommended this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy, simple, fun, beautiful baby shower decoration.
customer_reviews.text: My sister had a baby shower. I bought this to decorate and I had so many compliments. They were amazed and thought I'd created this masterpiece of balloons. This kit is very easy to put together and air up with pump provided. I don't think anyone could mess it up!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Reed

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Lovely decoration! Instructions were easy to follow and the finished product looked just like the picture. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jane pabon

customer_reviews.title: Loved these shower decorations!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sisters tea party themed baby shower & everything looked so beautiful! If your worrying it will take time, it’s easy to assemble and only took about 2 people to do. We did it the morning of the shower. I will definitely recommend these baby shower decorations & would use this company again for another event!
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Foliage not included
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. The hand pump that comes with the kit was very helpful. Only thing I disliked was that the green foliage does not come with the kit like pictured. Over set up was great.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: Great its a bit hard to assemble gave up and just had balloons everywhere but they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Ana cardona

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and SUPER easy to assemble!!
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect addition to our baby shower decor at our apartment. Everyone thought I ordered it pre-made and were shocked when I told them I made it! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Malaty

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: Was a little intimidated at first thinking it was going to be difficult to make it look like the picture, but to my delight, it came with very easy instructions and turned out perfect!! I got many compliments on this product!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie hole

customer_reviews.title: If you have extra hands and the space for all of it great
customer_reviews.text: It was just time consuming but the air pump that came with it was great. Hard to assemble definitely need another person.
customer_reviews.author: Beth McCandless

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: So cute! Got for a baby shower at work after realizing every other option in a store was way over priced. This was super easy to assemble and adorable. I recommended it to a few of the gals at the shower who were about to throw showers of their own. Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: BO

customer_reviews.title: Pretty! Perfect for a any event!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty! Perfect for a any event, but used for a baby shower.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful balloon arrangement with easy to follow instructions
customer_reviews.text: Loved how easy this was to put together. Instructions were easy to follow. Will purchase again for future events.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Takes time putting together
customer_reviews.text: Used this for my baby shower. Unfortunately the baby lettering had a hole in it so I couldn't use it but the balloons were absolutely beautiful! I had so many people ask where I got them from. It took some time putting it together but it turned out so nice.
customer_reviews.author: Janna

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful kit!
customer_reviews.text: My wife was so excited for this to come in, and it was almost perfect! she was so sad that the "Girl" part was defected and we weren't able to use it, rather than that everything was beautiful and easy enough to assemble. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Chanpheaktra San

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Received my kit earlier then expected which was great! Everything came as described and easy to follow instructions. Can't wait to use it at my baby shower!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bright colors and easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Really liked the colors and it was really fast and easy to set up used it for my daughter in law baby shower and she really loved it will order from you company again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfection!
customer_reviews.text: Everything in one kit, colors are perfect, just as pictured. Easy detailed instructions and a hand pump.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: I will never buy anything from this
customer_reviews.text: The only part of this we really used was the balloon that spelled out baby. This little balloons wouldn’t blow up. There was holes in them. Broke my heart because this was for my daughters first baby shower.
customer_reviews.author: Christy S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome .. worth buying
customer_reviews.text: It was awesome. Worth of spending money . It comes with balloon pump . Loved this.
customer_reviews.author: Prashant Shukla

customer_reviews.title: Defective Balloons
customer_reviews.text: 8 out of 12 balloons were defective. Now I have to come up with an alternative plan two days before the baby shower. How frustrating! AND air is slowly leaking from the “baby” balloon. I had to pump multiple times during the baby shower.
customer_reviews.author: katyz

customer_reviews.title: Makes your life easy and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Really pretty and worth the money, the baby shower looked beautiful and we only needed this for the whole background decoration. Deforme worth it. Makes your life SO much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Lisbeth lizardo

customer_reviews.title: Great decoration!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loooooved this! It came the next day I ordered it and everything was in the box. No damages or opened products. The colors were beautiful! I would definitely rebuy this if need be. If you’re thinking about buying this you definitely will love it!
customer_reviews.author: Silvia Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and easy step by step directions to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Kacie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Came out so cute for a work babyshower!! Bought the leaves separate but it finished the design.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!!
customer_reviews.text: This was my favorite decoration at my baby shower! It was big, colorful, and so perfect for the occasion. It is a bit time consuming to put together, however, the instructions were very detailed and concise. Well worth it 🙂
customer_reviews.author: angie

customer_reviews.title: Cute and easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: I really like how cute and easy it was to make! The kit truly came with everything! I'd definitely recommend for anyone throwing a baby shower.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and easy
customer_reviews.text: It’s a pretty cute balloon garland . It was easy to assemble, and it didn’t take too long to blow up the balloons. The only thing was that by the end of the day the balloons lost a lot of their air.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: The kit was very easy to put together. It came out really beautiful and everyone loved it! I did appreciate that it came with the balloon pump. Would definitely recommend 💝
customer_reviews.author: WRM

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Cute packaging! The kit was so easy to use! Took no time at all to assemble!
customer_reviews.author: Kacie

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great price and easy to assemble but very difficult to put up. We ended up not using the balloon structure at all because it kept falling down! Wished there were more guidance on how to hang it up.
customer_reviews.author: Neha Mehra

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It was so pretty, everybody at the party was saying how good it looked. Also easy to assemble and the air pump came in super handy.
customer_reviews.author: Mello

customer_reviews.title: Check if there is a hole as soon as you get it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Opened it night before my baby shower and found out there was a hole in the “girl” balloon :(((
customer_reviews.author: GIgi

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This kit was perfect for the baby shower I was hosting. It does take a bit of time to assemble, I put it together the nght befor and the balloons were all still inflated the next morning.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Ross

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money! Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my baby shower and this was a hit! Set it up the night before comes with everything you need and it was so easy! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great product—would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed with this product. I have purchased similar priced decoration packages previously but this one really went above and beyond.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Instagramable kit!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful kit. Perfect for my friend baby shower. Perfect for the theme. Perfect for an instagram able photo op! Fast shipping too! No brainer
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Cook

customer_reviews.title: Great choice !
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and came out great. It looked gorgeous once out all together. Smaller box than I thought it would come in but everything was great
customer_reviews.author: Alisa

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Used it for my baby shower. Packaging was cute. High quality. It was worth the money. Everyone loved it during my baby shower. Came out beautiful.

customer_reviews.title: It comes with a hand pump and matching ribbon
customer_reviews.text: Product was exactly as described, great quality, helpful instructions! And beautiful

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Came in a super cute box with easy to assemble instructions. Had tons of compliments!

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: This product came packaged so nicely! I really enjoyed the easy directions and assembly. It looks so wonderful put together! Great product.

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assemble and beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy with my baby shower decorations. The package arrived with all the items in the description and instructions.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Balloon Set
customer_reviews.text: The balloons made a beautiful visual impact at the shower where they were used. Guests couldn't believe I had made the balloon "arch" myself. Very easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: You get all you need... and it is beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I loved this! The package has everything ready for easy assemble. Buying it again for future celebrations!

customer_reviews.title: Takes about 45 mins to an hour if you only have one hand pump
customer_reviews.text: It was an easy install, especially since I had my niece put it together. She followed the instructions as is. Highly recommended! Product comes with everything needed.

customer_reviews.title: Nice! Easier than expected
customer_reviews.text: Easier than I thought would be to assemble and looked as pictured

customer_reviews.title: Great directions and very easy.
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy for me and I’m not a crafty person! I had so many compliments! It took me more time to blow the balloons up than it did to assemble the garland. I would definitely buy again.

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect addition to my friends baby shower! Easy to assemble, great colors and the perfect size and length !

product_meta.title: Baby Shower Decorations for Girl | Baby Girl Shower Decorations | Baby Shower Balloons | Balloon Garland Kit | 11" & 5" Pink, White and Confetti Balloons | Rose Gold Baby Girl Script Balloon (Pink)
feature_bullets: ❤BABY SHOWER PARTY DÉCOR: A great joy is coming into your life which is why we designed our baby girl party decorations to provide you with a hassle-free and magical way to celebrate your little princesses gender reveal party and baby shower! With a blend of white, pink and gold you’ll have everything you need to create a complete and fabulous look for your Baby Shower or Gender Reveal.

❤EVERYTHING YOU NEED: Our baby girl shower decorations kit comes with everything you need to throw a party that people will want to remember. This DIY baby shower for girl decorations bundle includes a Rose Gold BABY GIRL Script Foil Balloon, Balloon Garland Decorating Strip, Dual Action Hand Pump, 5-inch 60 Balloons (23 Light Pink, 14 Hot Pink, 23 White), and 9-inch 11 Latex Balloons (3 White, 3 Pink, 3 Confetti).

❤EASY TO ASSEMBLE: You don’t need to be a DIY expert to use these baby shower decorations or waste your whole day! Our baby shower girl decorations kit comes with detailed instructions that let you quickly and easily assemble the garland without wasting any time to add a magical, chic and modern touch to the look of any baby shower or gender reveal party.

❤INCREDIBLY VERSATILE: The baby girl foil balloon coupled with the gorgeous balloon garland creates a magical environment that gets everyone excited! Simply inflate with the hand pump, hang it up on your on any wall, mantel, or even outside patio and you’ll have fabulous decorations that double as fun photo booth props so that you can take memorable pictures and effortlessly raise the WOW factor of any party.

❤100% RISK-FREE PURCHASE: Customer satisfaction always has and always will be our top priority. This is why we go the extra mile to make sure our baby shower decorating kit looks absolutely fabulous. We’re confident that you’re going to love these decorations which is why we offer a 30 Day Customer Satisfaction Guarantee so that you can order today knowing your purchase is risk-free.
